definitions.definition: Curved or bowed outward like the outside of a bowl , circle , or sphere .
having an epigraph that is a convex set.
labels: of a real-valued function on the reals
definitions.label_groups: functional analysis , not comparable , of a real-valued function on the reals

definitions.definition: having no internal angles greater than 180 degrees.
definitions.label_groups: geometry , not comparable , of a polygon

definitions.definition: arranged such that for any two points in the set, a straight line between the two points is contained within the set.
labels: of a set in Euclidean space
definitions.label_groups: mathematics , not comparable , of a set in Euclidean space

main_definition: Curved or bowed outward like the outside of a bowl , circle , or sphere .
secondary_definitions: ( functional analysis , not comparable , of a real-valued function on the reals ) having an epigraph that is a convex set.
( geometry , not comparable , of a polygon ) having no internal angles greater than 180 degrees.
( mathematics , not comparable , of a set in Euclidean space ) arranged such that for any two points in the set, a straight line between the two points is contained within the set.
